did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Paul R. Eberts papers, 1951-2005
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, notes and lectures for courses taught by Prof. Eberts, projects including Mayors' Survey and CARDI (Community and Rural Development Institute), papers and other manuscripts.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Paul R. Eberts was on the faculty in the Rural Sociology Department (later Development Sociology).

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, notes and lectures for courses taught by Prof. Eberts, projects including Mayors' Survey and CARDI (Community and Rural Development Institute), papers and other manuscripts.
